metadata.Title: CVE-2021-2154 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: DML). Supported versions that are affected are 5.7.33 and prior.Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQLServer. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.3 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
